group_1.textLeft: Yumiii!

group_1.textRight: Whoa! Hey! Are you on your way home?

group_1.textLeft: Yup! I don't have to work today. Let's@go home together!

group_1.narration: About 1 year after I formed my contract...
I was going to a vocational school,@and Yumi was in her last year.

group_1.textRight: How is it?

group_1.textLeft: School? Umm, weeell, [chara:305301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:305301:cheek_0][chara:305301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:305301:lipSynch_1]it's not especially@different.
I was going to a performing arts school@anyway, so the lessons are super similar!
Your turn! Are you catching everybody's eye @on the athletic front?

group_1.textRight: Yeah! I got a sports recommendation!

group_1.textLeft: Wow! That's amazing! I'm sooo happy for you!

group_1.textRight: There's an exam, but it's mainly a practical@test.

group_1.textLeft: Then you're for suuure gonna get in!

group_1.textRight: I can't just take it easy, though.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:305301:effect_ef_adv_01][se:7201_detect_magic]...?!
Yumi!

group_1.textRight: Yeah. Let's go!

group_1.narration: As a team, Yumi and I had@no trouble fighting Witches.
Maybe it's because we grew up together? We@were always in sync. No chance we'd lose.

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashRed2][se:3001_chara_damage][chara:305300:effect_shake][bgEffect:shakeLarge]Ugh...
(This Witch... It's a lot stronger than the@ones we fought before.)

group_1.narration: We were struggling a lot more than usual.
And... It caught me off guard after my magic@was depleted.

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall]...

group_1.textRight: (Is it coming this way?! [wait:0.8][chara:305300:cheek_0][chara:305300:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json]No! It's not aiming@for me!)
Yumi!!! Watch out!
Yumi! Yumiii!!! I-I'll be right there...

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeSmall]...

group_1.textRight: [flashEffect:flashRed2][se:3001_chara_damage][chara:305300:effect_shake][bgEffect:shakeLarge]Ow! [chara:305300:lipSynch_0][wait:0.5][chara:305300:eyeClose_1][chara:305300:cheek_1][chara:305300:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:305300:lipSynch_1]You... [chara:305300:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:305300:motion_200][chara:305300:eyeClose_0][chara:305300:lipSynch_1][flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:3053A01]Get out of my way!

group_1.narration: Yumi was badly injured, and with her@prep class exam coming up soon...

group_1.textRight: Yumi! Stay with me!

group_1.textLeft: Oh... Oh no... My leg...
Ikumi... I... I won't be able to play@volleyball...anymore...

group_1.textRight: S-stay calm, it'll be all right... I promise.@I promise, you'll be fine!
Let's get out of here and head straight to@the hospital. Then, maybe...

group_1.textLeft: It's no use... With these injuries... I can't@take my exam...

group_1.textRight: Don't say that!

There's got to be some way... [chara:305300:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:305300:cheek_2][chara:305300:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:305300:lipSynch_1]I know! If we@get help from other Magical Girls...

group_1.textLeft: I can't... It's all over...
Our...our dream is...o...ver...
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeLarge]Aaaaaaaaaaaah!!!

group_1.textRight: What... What?! What's...happening...
(Why... Why is there a monster coming out@of Yumi?)

group_1.narration: You remember what happened@after that, right, Ryo?

group_1.textRight: Hey, you!

group_1.textLeft: Wh-who are you?!

group_1.textRight: Save it! We gotta get out of here before the@Labyrinth crumbles!
I'll carry her, can you run?!

group_1.textLeft: Y-yeah, I think so! Sorry...and thanks.

group_1.narration: I just stood there, dumbfounded@at seeing a Doppel for the first time,@and you saved me, Ryo.

group_1.textRight: *Exhale* Just barely made it out in time!

group_1.textLeft: Yumi! Yumiii! Wake up, come on!

group_1.textRight: She's just unconscious. That injury looks@pretty bad, though...

group_1.textLeft: (Yumi... It's all right. You'll be okay...)
(I heard there are Magical Girls who are@good at healing...)
(I promise I'll find one, and you'll be@healed in time for your exam...)

group_1.textRight: Sorry to ask at a time like this...
But what WAS that thing back there?

group_1.textLeft: That thing? The thing that came out of Yumi?

group_1.textRight: Yeah.

group_1.textLeft: I have no idea. What do I do if it's@something really bad?
I don't know what I'd do...if anything@happened to her...

group_1.textRight: Let's go see the Coordinator.
Mitama might have some answers.

group_1.narration: I'm so glad you were there, Ryo.@I don't know what I would've done@if I'd been alone back there...
